Jackie's Corner

Hi. I'm Jackie (she/her). I created this site out of a desire to have my own space on the web beyond just a carefully curated twitter profile or a discord presence. This site contains my art, thoughts, and whatever other random things I feel like putting up. Take a look around, this site will be updated fairly often. I hope.
